Description.Name: Gamma Pod
Description.Details: The Gamma Pod is very much a blank slate, as only its internal support structures survived intact. Rebuilding the habitation decks of the pod will bring the pilot's barracks to a maximum capacity of eighteen. It is a pity we can't field them all at the same time. With the Gamma pod online you have room for 18 'Mech Pilots.

AssignedCastDescription: Commander, there are already a half dozen requests for new facilities for the extra unused space in Gamma Pod, ranging from a swimming pool to a DropShip-sized bouncy castle. We leave these 'fun' decisions in your hands, Commander
